# Documentation Templates

**Created:** 2025-12-17T04:58:48Z UTC
**Modified:** 2025-12-17T04:58:48Z UTC


**Purpose:** Reusable templates for documentation  
**Audience:** All team members, AI agents

---

## Overview

This directory contains templates for various types of documentation.

---

## Files

Create templates as needed:

- `meeting-notes-template.md` - Template for meeting notes
- `adr-template.md` - ADR template (also in decisions/)
- `feature-doc-template.md` - Feature documentation template
- `api-doc-template.md` - API documentation template

---

## Related

- **Decisions:** `../decisions/adr-template.md` - ADR template
- **All docs:** `../` - Use templates when creating new documentation

---

**Note:** Templates help maintain consistency across documentation.
